paragraphs.body: Marshall was born in Glendale to composer Jack Marshall. The first few years of his life was spent in Van Nuys, California, before moving to Newport Beach, where he attended Newport Harbor High School.
paragraphs.text: Marshall was born in Glendale to composer Jack Marshall. The first few years of his life was spent in Van Nuys, California, before moving to Newport Beach, where he attended Newport Harbor High School.

paragraphs.body: An athletic person, Marshall is also a former VP member of the Board of Directors and member of the Executive Committee of the United States Olympic Committee (USOC). Marshall was awarded the Olympic Shield in 2005 and inducted into the U.S. Olympic Hall of Fame class of 2008 for his years of service to the USOC.
paragraphs.text: An athletic person, Marshall is also a former VP member of the Board of Directors and member of the Executive Committee of the United States Olympic Committee (USOC). Marshall was awarded the Olympic Shield in 2005 and inducted into the U.S. Olympic Hall of Fame class of 2008 for his years of service to the USOC.

paragraphs.body: He married Kathleen Kennedy in 1987 and has had two children with her.
